title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jan 27 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jan 27 2022
description:
Joe Biden's racist criteria for picking a Supreme Court justice. Buck says "it's gross" and, for example, if you said you were only going to hire an Asian female CEO in business it would be clearly considered racist. Breyer blindsided by Dems' retirement leak. Speculation about Kamala for SCOTUS. Clay ponders if this is "the exit strategy for Democrats to run away from Kamala Harris as their presumptive takeover candidate for Joe Biden." Columnist Miranda Devine joins Clay and Buck to discuss the Biden illegal alien smuggling scandal. Though Psaki tries to explain away these kinds of situations, video footage shows illegal aliens being released at Westchester County Airport in New York. What Democrats are doing "for the children" is child abuse.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
